messages.content:
What I Fixed

  Before:
  - ChatPanel displayed hardcoded MOCK_MESSAGES (static
  conversation history)
  - No way to receive citizen responses
  - Messages never updated dynamically

  After:
  - Dynamic message state management
  - WebSocket connection listening for citizen.response events
  - Real-time message display with "thinking..." indicator
  - Messages appear immediately when you send them
  - Ready for Phase 3B autonomous responses

  Current Chat Flow

  What Works Now:
  1. ✅ User types message in ChatPanel
  2. ✅ Message appears in UI immediately
  3. ✅ Stimulus sent to /api/consciousness/stimulus
  4. ✅ "Thinking..." indicator with animated dots shows
  5. ✅ WebSocket listener waits for citizen.response event

  What's Still Missing:
  6. ❌ No response comes back (forged identity generator not
  integrated)
  7. ❌ "Thinking..." indicator stays forever

  Why Responses Don't Work Yet

  Infrastructure Ready (My Work):
  - ✅ forged_identity_generator.py (generates prompts from WM
  state)
  - ✅ forged_identity_integration.py (manages generators)
  - ✅ ForgedIdentityViewer.tsx (dashboard component)
  - ✅ ChatPanel.tsx (WebSocket listener for responses)

  Consciousness Integration Blocked:
  - ❌ Schema warnings in consciousness_engine_v2.py (5
  deprecated "Entity" references)
  - ❌ Forged identity not wired into tick loop
  - ❌ Phase 3B (LLM execution) not implemented

  Owner: Felix/Victor need to:
  1. Fix schema warnings (change "Entity" → "SubEntity")
  2. Wire forged_identity_integration into tick loop
  3. Implement LLM execution (Claude API calls)

  What You'll See When You Test

  Immediate:
  - Send a message in ChatPanel
  - Message appears in UI ✅
  - "Thinking..." indicator with bouncing dots ✅
  - Indicator never clears (no response comes) ⏳

  After Felix/Victor Integration:
  - Same flow but citizen response will actually arrive
  - "Thinking..." indicator clears
  - Citizen message appears in chat
  - Full conversation works

  The infrastructure is complete and waiting for consciousness
  engine integration.
